title: This camera is TINY!!! - Insta360 Go2 Camera
description: Thanks to Insta360 for sponsoring today's video! Buy the Insta360 GO2 camera at   Insta360 has been around now making 360 and action cameras. The GO2 isn't too different from what they usually do but it's fairly small and compact so you can take it anywhere you want to go!  Check out the BTS video using this camera at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
